column5: I woke up today to look out the window and see a big blizzard (in Parry Sound area) and already herd the ambulance fly by once so far.  Just a heads up to be safe on the roads they are looking bad up here.
I'm at the office here in downtown Toronto....Cant see a thing it's snowing so hard!!!  Here's a live traffic camera...Bayview and 401...taken at 8:30am.
am suppose to be heading ot north bay this afternoon, hopefuly it clears up by then!  Cheers!
As long as I can get this household full of young adults home on reading week to Blue Mountain...we'll be good !
